sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LoanService } from 'src/app/services/loan.service'; import { LoanData } from 'src/models/LoanData'; @Component({ selector: 'app-select-customer', templateUrl: './select-customer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./select-customer.component.css'] }) export class SelectCustomerComponent { loanData:LoanData={email:'',customerName: '', amount:'',term:'',approvalDate:0,status:''}; constructor(private loanService:LoanService,private activateRoute: ActivatedRoute,private router:Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.activateRoute.paramMap.subscribe(params => { let email = params.get('email') ??""; this.loanService.getSingleCustomerForLoan(email).subscribe((data) => { this.loanData = data; }); }); } }
